scripts.deploy: cd subgraph && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ shotaronowhere/sequencer-analytics
scripts.create-local: cd subgraph && graph create --node http://localhost:8020/ shotaronowhere/sequencer-analytics
scripts.remove-local: cd subgraph && graph remove --node http://localhost:8020/ shotaronowhere/sequencer-analytics
scripts.deploy-local: cd subgraph && graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 shotaronowhere/sequencer-analytics
